name: Tanks Battle
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2138960/dot_TANKI/
You can try this game for free in our other project

==================================

Defeat the enemy tank with the help of logic and tactics.

The player uses the mouse to control a projectile fired from the tank. The player's task is to direct the projectile so that it overcomes obstacles and hits the enemy tank.

The game has 20 levels.

Achievements and leaderboards are available in the game
